mean_cn: v. 缝，绣；  n. 一针，线迹，缝法，编结法，（肋部的）突然剧痛
mean_en: to use a needle and thread to make or repair (something, such as a piece of clothing) :to join (something, such as a piece of fabric or a button) to something else with stitches
sentence: The tailor knows how to stitch clothes well.
sentence_trans: 这裁缝知道如何把衣服缝好。
